short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the amount with Finnish ALV along with the original prize. Works in creationwatches site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a simple extension, made originally for my own use, but I decided to publish it here as well. 
It only works on the creationwatches site, and it calculates the item price after Finnish taxes and shows it next to the original prize for an easier reference. Improvements possible.
